主樓層和地下室均設有精美的電視和大螢幕，吸引了來自各地的運動迷。座位安排為始終面向螢幕。

距離敦化藍線車站僅幾個街區，交通十分便利。請記住 3 號出口。

雖然不是精釀啤酒天堂，但它提供許多精釀啤酒。他們有多種瓶裝和桶裝本地啤酒和精釀啤酒可供選擇。我特別喜歡他們的 Redpoint Tai P.A.品脫即飲。昨晚我嘗試了他們的新產品—紅點迪斯可金剛鸚鵡。哇！想像一下 IPA 與多汁的淡色艾爾啤酒的結合。哦，太好吃了！價格昂貴（新台幣270元），但物超所值。我最後喝了三品脫......艱難的生活......

總體而言，按照我的評分標準，它們的評分為 4.5。服務生現在認出了我，幾乎都知道我的名字，他們肯定知道我的飲食和啤酒特質。

在他們搞砸之前，這將繼續是我在整個台北最喜歡的酒吧和精釀啤酒店。為 On Tap 出色的工作乾杯！ 〜jb

Last night, a local friend from Hungary and a local colleague in Taiwan came to ON TAP to watch the Australian-New Zealand Rugby League competition.

This is my first comment on on Tap, but since the first visit last December last year, I have been here many times.I admit that it is my favorite bar in Taipei.

I would have given them 5 stars, but I have comments on the taste, music level noise and service level of their burgers.There are enough activities, not 5 stars.However, please consider my discerning and selfish five -star rating.

On TAP seems to be well managed, and the staffing is also very good, which is enough to deal with the two -story people who appear there throughout the week.This is not your usual quiet bar.All nationality are there, including many locals.

Both the main floors and the basement have exquisite TVs and big screens, attracting sports fans from all over the world.The seat arrangement is always facing the screen.

There are only a few neighborhoods from Dunhua Blue Line Station, and the transportation is very convenient.Remember to export No. 3.

Although it is not a craft beer paradise, it offers many craft beer.They have a variety of bottles and barrels of local beer and craft beer to choose from.I especially like their Redpoint Tai P.A.Last night I tried their new product -the Red Dot Diske Macaw.Wow!Imagine the combination of IPA and juicy pale Alle Beer.Oh, so delicious!The price is expensive (NT $ 270), but it is worth it.I finally drank Sanpin and took off ... a difficult life ...

Overall, according to my scoring standards, their scores are 4.5.The waiter recognizes me now, and almost everyone knows my name. They must know my diet and beer characteristics.

Before they messed up, this will continue to be my favorite bar and craft beer restaurant in Taipei.Toast for ON TAP excellent work!~ JB
